FuncDef: The reset pki ocsp server down-information command clears the DOWN status information of the OCSP server recorded on the device. The reset pki ocsp server down-information command clears the DOWN status information of the OCSP server recorded on the device.
CLIs: reset pki ocsp server down-information [ url [ esc ] <url-addr> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the OCSP server's URL address. If no URL address is specified, clear the DOWN status information on all OCSP servers.
The value is a string starting with http:// and consisting of 1 to 128 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

The URL address in ASCII format is supported.
-
